body:
## MTConnect C++ Agent
The C++ Agent is the reference implementation of the MTConnect Agent for the MTConnect standard.

### Windows Binary Downloads
Github has stopped providing storage for binary downloads. Downloads will from now on be referenced here.

#### Latest
[C++ Agent Version 1.2.0.17 minimal](https://s3.amazonaws.com/mtconnect-agent/cppagent_win32_1.2.0.17_bin_minimal.zip)

[C++ Agent Version 1.2.0.17 full](https://s3.amazonaws.com/mtconnect-agent/cppagent_win32_1.2.0.17_bin.zip)

#### Stable

#### Archive

### Authors and Contributors.
The C++ Agent has been written and maintained by William Sobel of System Insights (@wsobel).
name: Cppagent
